com.adsboard.controller

Class AdsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adsboard.controller.AdsController

  • @Controller
public class AdsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Project Ads board. This Controller class is used for control of /ads pages Implements the display of of ads lists filtered by criteria
    Since:
    October 30, 2015
    Author:
    Oleksandr Lukichov

      • ads

        @RequestMapping(value="/ads",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String ads(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="adFilterSettings")
                                                                                        AdFilter adFilterSettings,
                                                                                        java.security.Principal principal)
        The method for filtering and showing of ads. Implements filtering of ads: by like username, by the rubric, all ads, my ads by the sort criterias adds to the model one of lists of ads objects
        Parameters:
        Model - model
        AdFilter - adFilterSettings
        Principal - principal
        Returns:
        String
